name: Conntract Killer
description:
You play as a customer trying to escape from the Lemon phone company, they want to force you into a contract that signs your soul over to them. Using your new found teleporting abilities, fight your way to freedom.

Known Issue: Character sometimes falls through the level if the phone is thrown into an awkward corner.

Inspired by the Inktober 2019 prompt, "Ring". The goal is to create a new game every 2 weeks, so we'll see how that goes. This is also my first game ever......be gentle with me :)
